name: Diorama
description:
Welcome to Diorama !

Visit this game ! Only two levels for now, I hope to have time for more.

Controls:

Use your mouse to grab the ground at the BOTTOM of your screen. (Left or Right)
This will turn the diorama and change the time.

You have to found all the secrets buttons on levels.
The buttons are in a slightly differents colors.

I recommand you the windows version.
